title: Penny Dreadful: A Mage: the Ascension Novel in Eight Parts and a
description:
Penny Dreadful: A Mage: the Ascension Novel in Eight Parts and an Epilogue

originally downloaded from Http://www.White-Wolf.com

content owned by white-wolf, but was released for Free. no longer on the White-wolf Website, i bring it here so others can download this very interesting Novel.

Writen by Kevin Andrew Murphy.

a story about a young Witch living in the San Franscisco bay area, in White-wolf's (old) World of darkness. Vampires, Werewolves, the dead, demon cultists, six foot tall rabbit pookas, this story covers about all it's bases. sprinkled with pop culture referances, that give it that "real" feel lacking in far too many settings/stories, and with a good amount of humor. If you like Jim Butcher's Dresdin files, Mage is the game for you, and Penny Dreadful will be a fun read.
